trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see langword="AudioLevelUpdated" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento <see langword="AudioLevelUpdated" /> da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: When they are raised, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> events pass an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs> to the handler for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: Quando eles são gerados, o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos passam uma instância de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs> para o manipulador para o evento associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A> property gets the new level of audio input when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A> propriedade obtém o novo nível de áudio de entrada quando o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: The `AudioLevel` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes provides the current level of the audio input to the speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: O `AudioLevel` propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes fornece o nível atual de entrada de áudio para o mecanismo de reconhecimento de fala.

trans-unit.source: The following example adds an event handler to a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir adiciona um manipulador de eventos para um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The handler outputs the new audio level to the console.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador gera o novo nível de áudio para o console.

trans-unit.source: Gets the new level of audio input after the <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated" /> or the <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated" /> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o novo nível de entrada de áudio após o evento <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated" /> ou <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated" /> ser gerado.

trans-unit.source: The new level of audio input.
trans-unit.target: O novo nível de entrada de áudio.
